title: Yaatra
description: Yaatra - Travel Listing Platform. A dynamic travel web app where users can: 📍 Add and explore travel listings 📝 Write and read reviews 📸 Upload images via Cloudinary 🔐 Register/Login with Passport.js 🖥️ Beautiful UI with Tailwind & EJS.

title: CodeX
description: CodeX is a full-stack EdTech platform built using React, Node.js, Express, and Redux. It allows educators to share learning materials, manage content, and interact with students through a responsive and user-friendly interface. Deployed using Vercel and Render.

title: My Portfolio
description: This is a personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and contact information. Built using React and CSS with responsive design and deployed online.
